name: Campfire Friends!
description:
You need to gather food from the forest for your camping buddies. The forest is a magical land of music - tap the keys to the beat to collect stuff! But be sure only to collect the food that your animal likes to eat...

Instructions:

  • Press D, F, J, K when stuff falls to the bottom of the screen
  • Talk to your animal friends to find out what food they like

Credits:

  • Radetzky (Programmer) https://stoicheia.github.io/summary
  • King Aurorus (Musician) https://kingaurorusmusic.com/
  • Ellisbug (Artist) https://ellisbug.carrd.co/
  • Killers_BG1 (Stuff)

Known issues:

  • Upon restarting the game, you can't progress beyond the results screen of the first song. I've fixed this but the game jam is already over :(
